description: This table extracts the variants' link source for the results stored in INDICATOR_REL_ORD_VAR.

columns.name: PAT_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the pt indicators record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PAT_GENOMICS_IND_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the corresponding variant in the VARIANT_ID column of the INDICATOR_REL_ORD_VARIANT table was added manually or by the translation engine.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual Entry


Translation Engine
